summary: Implements the Atrous Spatial Pyramid Pooling (ASPP) block used in DeepLab segmentation models, offering parallel dilated convolutions and image-level pooling to capture multi-scale contextual information for mobile-friendly vision transformer architectures.
business_intent: Provide a compact, reusable TensorFlow component that enriches feature representations in mobile vision models, improving semantic segmentation accuracy while keeping computational cost low.
